abstract: The State Department has concluded, over earlier E.P.A. objections, that the Keystone pipeline would have "limited adverse environmental impacts" if operated according to regulations.
snippet: The State Department has concluded, over earlier E.P.A. objections, that the Keystone pipeline would have "limited adverse environmental impacts" if operated according to regulations.
lead_paragraph: As the State Department faces accusations of tipping its hand in considering approval of the Keystone XL pipeline, the Room for Debate blog has organized a broad discussion of pipeline safety and environmental risks.
